Name: Austerity
Description: Leave this card face-up in front of you for the remainder of the game. You may only have 1 Trait in play. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Concession
Description: Leave this card face-up in front of you for the remainder of the game.Â You may only have Harvest two spaces at the end of each Age. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Haste
Description: Your turn ends immediately when you play this. If you play this, it must be the first and only action of your turn. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Poverty
Description: Leave this card face-up in front of you for the remainder of the game. Your hand limit is 3. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Pity
Description: Choose another player. They gain 10 Gold. You gain 5 Gold.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Leave this card face-up in front of you for the remainder of the game. You may only have 4 Acolytes in play. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Totality
Description: Remove each of your Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. If you removed at least 4 Acolytes, gain 5 Gold.
